original100PercentDescription: Indulge in the exquisite taste of chocolate bars, candy canes, ice cream, toffee, and delightful cookies – a sweet symphony of flavors awaits.
replacement10DaysDescription: Experience worry-free shopping with our 10-day replacement policy. If your purchase isn’t perfect, we’ll gladly replace it with a smile. Enjoy the finest treats worry-free!
warrantyYearDescription: Relish peace of mind with our 1-year warranty. Our commitment to quality ensures that your purchase, like a cotton candy gingerbread cake, stays sweet and delightful throughout the year.

starterMessage: Achieve results with a healthy, smart diet.
noActivePlan: You don't have an active plan
howFastAchieveGoal: How fast you want to achieve your goal
slowSpeed: ideal for sustainable, long-term success with minimal pressure and flexibility
recommendedSpeed: Ideal for consistent results with moderate pressure
fastSpeed: Ideal for short-term goals, but requires more effort
progress__tour__1: Your goal is divided into smaller milestones, making it easier to achieve and keeping you motivated
progress__tour__2: This is our current target. You don't need to focus on anything else just one step at a time.
progress__tour__3: The streak table reinforce your good habits. The longer you maintain your streak, the stronger those habits grow.
profile__tour__1: If you changed your life style. For example increased your activity level, you can update them from you account section and we are going to adjust your plan automatically without affecting your progress.
subs__tour__1: You can switch between custom and general plans from this section to your preferences and needs.
subs__tour__2: Filter plans by subscription price for your chosen number of days by clicking the buttons below. Each button will display the cost for that specific duration.
subs__tour__3: Here are our top recommendations tailored to your needs. Feel free to explore these diets that are best suited for your condition.

goalChangingWarnning: Are you sure you want to change your goal
goalChaingingText:
We will update your current plan to reflect your new goal.
This means that starting from today, your plan will be adjusted according to your updated goals.
Don't worry, your progress and past data will remain unchanged.
Only your future steps will be adjusted to match your new goal.

heroTitle: The body you've always dreamed of
heroSubtitle: Provide you with all you need to build your dream body
problemDesc1: After helping many people become best version of themselves, we know one thing for sure: you'll NEVER regret reclaiming of your fitness and health.
problemDesc2: We also know what it takes to achieve the body you desire.
key1Desc: You don’t need all the information. You only need practical tips that works for you.
key2Desc: First step is crucial even if it's baby step.
key3Desc: is the determining factor in achieving your goal
enterBodyAndGoal: Tell us about your body and goal
getRoadmapDetails: We generate a detailed roadmap on how to achieve your goal for free
guidenceDesc: We simplify your roadmap into monthly milestones, providing only the information and tools you need for each month.
feature1Title: It cuts the crap that overwhelms you

feature2Subtitle: It does all the macros calculations for you and it recommends you suggestions that aligned with your goal and preferences

avoidFailureQuote: Time flies, Don't let your body steal your best moments
ourMissionText: We know the pain of feeling insecure in your own body. Our mission is to help you take charge of your life. With the right tools and guidence, you can transform your body, boost your confidence, and wake up proud every day.

ourMissionDesc: Our mission help you become the best version of yourself
faqsDesc: These are the most common concerns and questions people have when want to start
describeYourQuestion: Please describe your case to receive the most accurate advice
homeFaqs1Title: How chikrice will help us achive our goal?
homeFaqs1Desc: CHIKRICE serves as your guide by providing a clear roadmap and setting a long-term goal, which is then broken down into smaller, manageable targets. This structured approach helps you build the habits necessary for achieving results while minimizing uncertainty about your progress. With a proven plan, you can confidently trust the process, and as you track your progress daily, you can easily adjust if you miss a diet, knowing exactly what to do next. Ultimately, being on the right path increases your efficiency and optimizes your use of resources like time, money, and effort.
thisIsOurSuggestions: Base on your details we suggest you the following but still you can modify it if you wish
